casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 6, 2010

[Cite as 10/06/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-4857.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-1007. State v. Lester.

Auglaize App. No. 2-10-20. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Auglaize County. Upon consideration thereof,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that Jon Oebker of Cleveland, Ohio, is appointed to represent appellant.
